sqlQuery.Name: SQL Query
sqlQuery.Value:
-- Основная таблица компаний
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.company
(
    company_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    website TEXT,
    industry TEXT,
    employee_size TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    source TEXT,

    company_analyzed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    contacts_found BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    ai_opportunities_generated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    proposal_generated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Собранные данные о компании
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.company_collected_data
(
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES public.company(company_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    source_type TEXT NOT NULL, -- Например: 'website', 'news', 'linkedin'
    source_url TEXT,
    data_text TEXT,
    
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Контактные лица компании
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.company_contact
(
    contact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES public.company(company_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    contact_name TEXT,
    contact_role TEXT,
    contact_email TEXT,
    contact_phone TEXT,
    contact_linkedin TEXT,
    
    is_primary BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- AI-возможности для компании
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.company_ai_opportunity
(
    opportunity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES public.company(company_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    impact_score NUMERIC(5,2),
    affordability_score NUMERIC(5,2),
    
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Сгенерированные предложения
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.proposal
(
    proposal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES public.company(company_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    
    contact_id INTEGER REFERENCES public.company_contact(contact_id),
    ai_opportunity_id INTEGER REFERENCES public.company_ai_opportunity(opportunity_id),
    
    email_subject TEXT,
    email_body TEXT,
    presentation_url TEXT,
    
    status TEXT DEFAULT 'draft', -- draft / sent / approved / rejected
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now()
);

-- Лог поисковых запросов
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.search_query_log
(
    query_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    
    search_engine TEXT, -- Bing, Google
    query_text TEXT,
    executed_at TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
    search_count INTEGER,
    search_offset INTEGER,
    result_count INTEGER,
    result JSONB,
    is_processed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, -- [{"text":"snippet text","url":"http://.."}]
    notes TEXT
);
